parameters.name: IpType
parameters.description:
The type of the network. The value must be of the enumerated data type. Valid values:

*   **1** (default): Internet
*   **2**: internal network

parameters.name: RescaleLevel
parameters.description: The region level of the scale-out. Set the value to RegionId. RegionId specifies that resource scale-out is performed based on the ID of the edge node.

parameters.name: RescaleType
parameters.description: The scaling operation. Set the value to Add to add new resources.

parameters.name: ResourceInfo
parameters.description: The information about the resource specification template. The value must be a JSON string.

parameters.name: ResourceSelector
parameters.description: The required resources. The value must be a JSON string.

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: The timeout period for asynchronous scale-out. Unit: seconds. Default value: 300.
